topic.title: Budget management
topic.shortdesc: Budgets are managed via menu Management Budgets

body.p: A budget is made of a certain amount of fields: a name, a value, a period of time in which the budget has been allocated, defined by a start date and a end date.
The budget must be defined in the financial and administrative information of inventory items.
It can be also defined over several entities (recursivity).
A budget summary grouped by inventory item types is shown (total spent per par type, total remaining).
body.note: when viewing sub-entity budget, total remaining budget is not accessible.
this total is be negative when total value of inventory item is greater than budget value.
templates can be defined for budgets (see ).
